spatial_accuracy.notes: General wall layout is highly accurate. Door placements and orientations match the blueprint. Window count is overall preserved, though some minor scaling inconsistencies exist on the Activity room wall.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms (Bed 2, 3, 4, Bath, WC, Activity, Balcony) are present with correct adjacency. Wall thickness is consistent. Minor hallucination of text on the balcony wall exterior.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement follows the diagram closely, including bed orientations and robe locations. Scale is slightly off in 'Bed 3' compared to the 2D dimensions provided.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent orthographic projection and clean ivory-toned geometry. Lighting is soft and professional. Text labels are crisp, though some numbers in labels have been slightly altered from original values.

detected_errors.description: Activity room dimensions text changed from 3810x4770 to 3310x4700 in the render.
Hallucinated 'BACETRAY' text rendering on the outer balcony wall edge.
Inconsistent text data mapping across room labels (Bed 2, 3, 4 dimensions do not perfectly match original source).
